artist: Artist: Robert Gibbings; Author: Sir Thomas Malory; Editor: A. W. Pollard; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: Moira and  Robert Gibbings
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: half blue linen, pattern paper sides in blue and white, gold-stamped lettering; endpapers: cream-white wove; slip case: blue-green paper over cardboard, printed label affixed (slightly damaged); type: Monotype perpetua; 784 pp.; 3 volumes
title: Le Morte D'Arthur
